title: Disenchanted Lullaby
lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
[Verse 1]
Disenchanted lullabies
Sing me yours, I'll sing you mine
Sing with me, now what's a boy to do?
What's a boy to do?
Sing along for yesterday
Sing along my soul to take
Sing along another song for you
What's a boy to do?
[Chorus]
I may be scattered!
A little shattered!
What does it matter?
No one has a fit like I do
I may be scattered!
A little shattered!
What does it matter?
No one has a fit like I do
I'm the only one that fits you
[Verse 2]
Whisper with me, pass the time
Whisper for the days gone by
Whisper with the voice inside of you
With this ring, you will be mine
With this ring, I multiply
With this ring, surrendering to you
What's a boy to do?

[Chorus]
I may be scattered!
A little shattered!
What does it matter?
No one has a fit like I do
I may be scattered!
A little shattered!
What does it matter?
No one has a fit like I do
I'm the only one that fits you
[Bridge]
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
[Chorus]
I may be scattered!
A little shattered!
What does it matter?
No one has a fit like I do
I may be scattered!
A little shattered!
What does it matter?
No one has a fit like I do
I'm the only one that fits you
No one has a fit like I do
I'm the only one that fits you
